verse: 2 1 [a]From inside the fish Jonah prayed to the Lord his God. 2 He said:

7 “When my life was ebbing away, I remembered you, Lord,
and my prayer rose to you, to your holy temple.

8 “Those who cling to worthless idols turn away from God’s love for them. 9 But I, with shouts of grateful praise, will sacrifice to you.
What I have vowed I will make good. I will say, ‘Salvation comes from the Lord.’”
10 And the Lord commanded the fish, and it vomited Jonah onto dry land.
